Text: RE price quotesKim It would be great if you could see these to me daily I use the information for two purposes to run our portfolio VaR and Marktomarket numbers and to have an indication of where the market is going Our attorney has contacted me to let me know that he is reviewing the Enfolio Monica Original Message From mailto Sent Monday January AM To Subject price quotes Monica Attached are some VERY rough prices for and years out at Malin and City Gate I am still working on access to the programs for options as well as more ACCURATE prices I know you are just trying to get a feel for what the market looks like right now so this should be good for that Also it looks like we dont have a master agreement in place with NCPA which would govern gas transactions Those transactions would be done under the General Terms Conditions as well Did you get a copy of those I am following up on getting you a Master Agreement as well as an ISDA and will keep you posted Call me if you have questions or need more info Thanks Kim See attached file Continuouspricequotesxls

I bought gas from Enron Cc the following gas today from Enron Nov Mar MMBtuday CG for Jul Jun MMBtuday Malin for Nov Mar MMBtuday Malin for Ill update you on the status of reaching our hedging goals soon Raveen Ill get you the paperwork once I get it from Enron Monica
baseload quantities Cc Kim Both Karla and I are out today When are the baseload quantities for November due to you If I dont hear from you today I will send them to you tomorrow Thursday Monica

City of Palo Alto Natural Gas RFPThank you for allowing us the opportunity to interview you as our potential natural gas supplier We will make our selection by May and would like to give you one final opportunity to send us your final proposal As was discussed in the interview it is the Citys desire to avoid daily price risk and EFOOFO penalties We understand that the changing market warrants the end user to take on more of that risk or to pay for it in the form of premiums however we also realize that our load is relatively constant and driven mainly by weather I have attached over three years of daily historical usage for the City Please consider this information when submitting your final proposal Please email me your final proposal by May Regards Monica V Padilla daily usage valuesxls daily usage valuesxls
Gas DA eligible loadKim Here is the data you requested Monica Gas DA Loadxls Gas DA Loadxls

CPAUs Gas Service ContractKim Attached is the Citys current boilerplate contract for gas services Let me know if this agreement will work Monica CPAU gas service agreementdoc CPAU gas service agreementdoc

RE Letter of Understanding Cc Kim Again to reiterate my changes include the following general terms of your offer in the LOU Seller to provide all incremental gas needs up to MMBtuday at Malin priced at bidweek flat and remaining incremental gas needs at PGE citygate bidweek flat Seller to act as the Buyers imbalance agent and provide such services as nomination scheduling and operations for all gas delivered to Buyer including gas purchased from a third party supplier Seller to protect Buyer from daily price risk and penalties on EFOOFO events Seller to provide in an electronic format daily price indications Also I spoke to Karla about this and she too had some changes First change the term demand charge to volumetric charge since demand charge is commonly assessed on nominated not actual load And change the deadline to June days can make a difference Thanks Monica Original Message From Ward Kim S mailtoKim NRONcom Sent Tuesday May PM To Monica Padilla Email Subject Letter of Understanding Monica Attached is a copy of the letter of understanding Barry will be signing the originals and we will overnight them to you tonight Let me know if you need anything else and I will send you prices tomarrow Thanks Kim LetterofunderstandingDOC

FW Gas meter Station Kim FYI Monica Original Message From Maan Raveen Sent Wednesday September AM To Balachandran Girish Cwiak Roger Scoby Greg Baldschun Randy Hirmina Lucie Keniston Eric Fattah Taha Kabat Tom Cc Dailey Karla Padilla Monica Kolling Grant Erlich Bernard Ralston Rosemary Hartmann Larry Subject FW Gas meter Station Folks We have a problem with PGEs natural gas meter which is one of the meters that records Palo Altos hourly gas consumption Looking at historical data it seems the problem started in early May Our consumption at that meter dropped by approx in May in Jun and in Jul compared to the previous year Our total metered consumption in general has been lower this year for May Jun Jul compared to last year PGE notified us of the problem last month and metioned that they were going to take steps to fix itI spoke with Frank Arroyo of PGE regarding back billing when and how they intend to fix the meter and below is his response Raveen Original Message From Arroyo Frank mailto Sent Wednesday August PM To Cc Kelly Drew De Wild Bert Subject Gas meter Station Raveen As we discussed the natural gas flow through Palo Alto Station located at Searsville and Oak Road appears to be much less than the designed minimum capacity of the PGE meter The current registered usage has also been much less recently than in the past Apparently there has been modifications to your distribution system that may be causing less load due to a redundant supply from a different meter station Our Engineering Department will call the Palo Alto Engineering Department to discuss options to potentially modify the current metering station Based on the noted natural gas flow through the meter when the meter station was evaluated it does not appear that we will be pursuing any corrective billing activities Although we must reserve the right to initiate corrective billing should the situation dictate Please call me if you have questions or if I can be of any assistance Frank

RE forcast for sept Cc Hi Kim Yes Does this forecast account for the meter that is out The load data I sent you last week for June and July is wrong One of the meters is out and reflects zero usage for those months I believe you guys have historical June and July usage for through Let me know if you need additional data We had talked about getting a forecast from you for months and months into the future Also I will fax you the baseload quantities for the month September this afternoon Call me if you have any questions Monica Original Message From Ward Kim S Houston mailtoKim NRONcom Sent Monday August AM To Monica Padilla Email Subject forcast for sept Monica Jasons forcast for september is average Max is and min is Is this what you were looking for Let me know if you have any questions Thanks kim This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you
